text: when I user HWPFDocument to  turn  a  doc  file  to  html.The graphical objects  was  missing  in  the  html  file.I  think  turn  those  graphical objects  to  pictures  is  better. And in  html  files,wmf format pictures can't  display.I think  turn  wmf  format pictures  to  png  or  jpg  format  picture  is  better.
